name: Virtual Villagers: The Lost Children
description: Somewhere in the Pacific, there was a beautiful island, called Isola, where lost villagers made their home. The castaways explored their small part of the island and knew every corner. Only a mysterious cave had not been carefully explored.
minimum_requirements: Supported OS: Windows 2000/XP/VistaProcessor: Pentium III 500Memory: 96 MB Graphics: 16MB of VRAMDirectX Version: DirectX 7.0 or laterHard Drive: 200 MB

reviews.review_text: All of these are gold even though I couldnt be caught dead playing them :) 10/10
